node.excerpt: Sadly, when I first passed by in my pre-caffeinated haze, I mistook them as another group of vagrants up to mischief on the sidewalk outside of Bean Bag Cafe, where I was heading to putz around over coffee for a while. They were doing something withâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Zen and the art of giving a f***

node.excerpt: What hubris. Publishing a blog at a website named after yourself? Adding to the ever-growing ocean of information whatever commonplace thought crosses your mind? For whom? Who cares? Why? Youâ€™re looking at it all wrong. Itâ€™s not for anyone but myselfâ€¦

Hey, itâ€™s been a while. Since my last entry I started and finished a contract job. It wasnâ€™t the kind of work that I really want to do, but I learned a lot (mainly about the nature of contract work) and was compensated well enough that I have time toâ€¦

Things had come to a head. My head, to be exact. They were prancing about and demanding my attention. I had decided to go home early because I could no longer feel the importance of anything. There I curled up in bed with a book and put on the radioâ€¦

So I went on a little adventure last month. Iâ€™m posting this a month after the fact because I wanted to finish this thing I made to accompany this blog post. Been putting in a couple hours a day a few days a week. What is it? A box that shows photosâ€¦

I finally feel like Iâ€™m winning the war against my insomnia. Iâ€™d been fighting this war for over two years and every night felt like a new battle. Daily exercise helped a lot, but it seemed like I needed eight hours of exercise to buy eight solidâ€¦
